title: Narrate a Fairy Tale
desc: Get creative and narrate your favorite fairy tale with a twist! Create a new storyline or reimagine the ending. Express your imagination and storytelling skills. Once done, upload the audio file of your narrated fairy tale with a twist.

content.desc: Narrate a fairy tale with a twist
How did your child come up with the new storyline or ending?
Did your child enjoy the process of adding a twist to the fairy tale?
